item.title: First post
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: When building the website, you can set a theme by using –theme option. However, we suggest you modify the configuration file (config.toml) and set the theme as the default. item.title: test post
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: This is my third post… An autoencoder will encode the input distribution into a low-dimensional tensor, which usually takes the form of a vector. This will approximate the hidden structure that is commonly referred to as the latent representation, code, or vector. This process constitutes the encoding part. The latent vector will then be decoded by the decoder part to recover the original input.
